description: Enabling Activities for the Preparation of the Second National Communication of Bangladesh to the UNFCCC

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
Output 1: National Circumstances
Output 2: National Green House Gas Inventories
Output 3: Programmes containing measures to facilitate Climate Chnage mitigation
Output 4: Programmes containing measures to facilitate adaptation to climate change
Output 5:  Other information considered relevant towards achieving the objective of the UNFCCC
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: PIMS 2961 EA-SNC
